title: selfencrypting solid state drives
extract: Self-Encrypting Drives. ... The term "Self-Encrypting Drive" (SED) is now common when referring to HDDs / SSDs with built-in full-disk encryption (FDE). OPAL is a set of specifications for self-encrypting drives developed by the Trusted Computing Group.Nov 22, 2018
extract_html: Self-Encrypting Drives. ... The term "Self-Encrypting Drive" (SED) is now common when referring to HDDs / SSDs with built-in full-disk encryption (FDE). OPAL is a set of specifications for self-encrypting drives developed by the Trusted Computing Group.Nov 22, 2018
